name: DeathRopes
description:
**The HTML5 version has some known bugs. Download and play the .exe version for the best experience**

Survive wave after wave of enemies in this small space shooter. Get the highest score.

Controls: 

Space/A to shoot

WASD/Arrows/Joystick to move

(When dead) press Space/A to restart or T/B to tweet your score

Music by GrumbleLabs http://grumblelabs.com/
